events.name: ReturnInitiated
events.description: Capture the beginning of the return process.

events.name: ReturnApproved
events.description: Mark the return as approved for processing.

events.name: ReturnRejected
events.description: Handle situations where a return cannot be processed.

events.name: ReturnRefunded
events.description: Complete the return with a refund to the customer.

commands.name: InitiateReturn
commands.description: Capture the beginning of the return process.

commands.name: ApproveReturn
commands.description: Mark the return as approved for processing.

commands.name: RejectReturn
commands.description: Handle situations where a return cannot be processed.

commands.name: ProcessRefund
commands.description: Complete the return with a refund to the customer.

integrationPoints.name: CustomerService
integrationPoints.description: Integration with customer service system for tracking and inquiries.

integrationPoints.name: InventoryManagement
integrationPoints.description: Updating inventory levels upon return handling.

integrationPoints.name: FinanceSystem
integrationPoints.description: Integration for processing refunds in the financial system.
